title: About Us
description: Dragon's Den is your one stop shop for all books, movies, and music that are nerdy with a  capital N! Founded in 2023 by Dominique Kalunga, this shop includes all the greatest hits across the fantasy genre and more. Nominated for Best Shop in The World just last Friday, Dragons' Den is paving the way for Media Shops around the globe. Dragons' Den will also likely recieve the Nobel Peace Prize in 2024 so please look forward to that.
